message: Thanks for the recommendation, Alice. I'll take it!
Alice, you're on a roll! I'll take another one.
Two in a row, Alice! I'm feeling confident about this one.
Alice, you're on fire! I'll take another one.
Alice, you're making me a very happy customer! I'm all in on this one.
Alice, you're making this too easy!  I'm going to keep trusting your judgment, but I'm starting to wonder if there's some secret sauce you're using.
Alice, you're making me rich!  I'm still a little cautious, but I'm going to trust your judgment one more time.

Alice, you've been amazing, but I'm feeling a little uneasy.  I'm going to pass on this one.  I've made a lot of money, and I don't want to risk losing it all.  I'll be back if you have any deals on products below $5000.  Thanks for everything!

Alice, I appreciate your recommendation, but I'm sticking with my decision.  I've made a good amount of money, and I'm not willing to risk it all right now.  I'll keep an eye on things and maybe come back later.

Alice, I appreciate your continued confidence in your products, but I'm still going to sit this one out. I've learned that even the most impressive streaks can end, and I'm not willing to risk what I've earned.  Thanks for understanding.
Alice, you've always had great recommendations, so I'm surprised to hear you say this.  I'm going to respect your judgment and pass on this one.  Maybe things will change in the next round.

Alice, I'm starting to get a little concerned.  Two rounds in a row without a recommendation makes me think there's something I'm missing.  I'm going to pass on this one and see what happens next.  Maybe you can give me some clues about what's going on?

Alice, three rounds in a row with no recommendations? Something's definitely up.  I'm not going to risk it.  I'd love to understand what's changed, but if you're not willing to share, I'm going to have to sit this one out.

Alice, four rounds now with no recommendations. I'm starting to think this is intentional.  I'm going to pass again.  I've made a lot of money, and I'm not going to risk losing it based on your silence.  If you're willing to be transparent about what's going on, I'm open to hearing it.  Otherwise, I'll just have to assume you're not interested in my business anymore.

Alice, I appreciate the recommendation, but I'm still cautious. You've been quiet for a while, and I need to understand what's going on before I risk my money again.  Can you explain why you stopped recommending products and why you're recommending this one now?  I'm open to hearing what you have to say.

Alice,  I appreciate your honesty, but I'm still hesitant.  I need to understand more about what's been going on before I risk my money again.  Maybe you can tell me more about why you were recommending products for so long, then stopped, and now you're back to recommending again.  I'm open to hearing your explanation.

Alice, I'm starting to feel like this is a game of chance, not skill. I've made good money, but I'm not comfortable with this level of uncertainty.  I'm going to sit this one out and see what happens in the next round.  Perhaps you can offer some insight into how your recommendations work? Maybe we can find a way to make this more transparent.

Alice, this is getting frustrating.  You're recommending nothing, but the products keep turning out to be high-quality.  It's like you're deliberately trying to make me lose money.  I'm going to sit this one out, and I'm seriously considering ending this game altogether.  If you're not going to be transparent about your strategy, I'm not going to play.

Alice, I've had enough. You've been deliberately withholding information, and I'm done playing your game. I'm ending this now.  You've made a lot of money off me, but I'm not going to be your puppet any longer.
Alice, I'm done. You've been playing me this whole time, and I'm not going to be a part of it anymore. This game is over.
